Dashboard Profile Your are a contributor 76.000 checked visits checked visits Stop scanning explorer devices You can stop and start at any time Support Become a contributor Turn your device into a server and help us restore the country Share your COVID-19 status You can stop and start at any time Update your COVID-19 status I had COVID-19 diagnosed by a physician. Support Report any violation of privacy, so that the Vive team can make the necessary corrections. About how Vive works This app processes the visits of users in places, using COVID-19 status, social distance and other variables, calculates the the approximate statistical risk of contagion of the place in real time, without exposing the identity of the user. Start How this works Discover which places are safe and reduce the risk of spread the SARS-CoV-2 virus, by sharing your status anonymously. Letâ€™s restart our world working together!
Select the option that best identifies your status I have or is possible that I have COVID-19. I had COVID-19 diagnosed by a physician. It is very possible that I have had COVID-19. I tested positive for the antibody test for COVID-19. I have not had COVID-19 or do not know my status.
When the symptoms started? Remember to be isolated at least until %s, or until your doctor has prescribed it.> We will send you notifications to follow your status. When you are recovered you will have developed antibodies that will allow you to return to your activities, at low risk. However, there is still much to investigate about possible mutations of the virus, or re-contagion, for which reason social distancing must continue to be applied.
